song.title: Stella
song.info:
Stella (c) 2006 by CREAM --------------------------------------- Hi there,
this one was started just for fun with VCS-coding after watching some intros for the Atari VCS 2600.
So this is the result... A small intro with music.
Note: This is NTSC !
It seems to run on the Stella and NO$2k6 emulator... Others i didn't check out...
And even no clue if it runs on a real VCS ;)
Cream 2006
---------------------------------------- /|\ www.creamhq.de /|\
